content.question: Most scholars believe that the bluestones used during the early construction phases at Stonehenge were

choices.label: transported with difficulty from a distant site, showing an ancestral connection to that region
acquired from nomadic peoples, providing evidence about prehistoric trading networks
taken through conquest to mark the graves of important military leaders, in an early example of spolia
excavated from nearby quarries by the local population, demonstrating technical skill

content.answer: transported with difficulty from a distant site, showing an ancestral connection to that region

topic.text: 1.3: Theories and Interpretations of Prehistoric Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
